text: Brahma is one of the three major gods of Hindus in Hindu mythology and Hinduism. Brahma is the creator of the whole universe. The other two gods are Vishnu, the preserver, and Shiva, the destroyer. == Other websites == * The Brahma-Samhita (Brahmasamhita.com) * Brahma's Prayers for Creative Energy (vedabase.net) * Brahma: The God with Only Three Temples (boloji.com) * Indian Gods and Goddesses - Brahma (indiayogi.com) Category:Hindu gods and goddesses
title: Brahma
